Amazon is having a huge sale over Bank Holiday weekend to rival Black Friday with over 70% off cutting-edge tech, home and beauty亚马逊叫板黑色星期五，推出打折周

Can't wait for Black Friday? Well, now you don't have to, as Amazon has just unveiled a massive discount event, with up to 70% off the RRPs of hundreds of products.New discounts will be announced every day, for the next six days, ending on the 30th August.等不及黑色星期五了？现在你不必等了，亚马逊网站刚刚推出了大规模的打折活动，上百种商品最高可打三折。本次活动将持续到8月30号，一共6天，天天都有商品打折。

While some of the deals, such as the above Echo discounts, will span the whole of the event, others will only last a day, with new offers being announced every morning.有些商品的打折期为六天，例如Amazon Echo，而有些商品的打折时间则只有一天，网站每天早上都会推出新的打折产品。

We've picked out our ten favourite products currently on offer, or you can shop all off the products currently on offer on Amazon's Shop the Future deals page here.以下是我们精心挑选的十件近期在售的爆品，你也可以在亚马逊旗下的“Shop the Future deals”网站进行选购。

Saturday's best deals:周六最佳单品：

Bose SoundTrue Ultra In-Ear Headphones in Charcoal black, £50 (was £94.95)Bose高保真入耳耳机（深灰色）现价：50英镑（原价：94.95英镑）

Both the Apple and Android versions are currently on sale.苹果版和安卓版线上均有销售。

Panasonic 49-inch 4K TV, £569 (was £619)松下49英寸4K电视，现价：569英镑（原价：619英镑）

Bosch High Pressure washer, £94.99 (was £149.51)德国博世高压清洗机，现价：94.99英镑（原价：149.51英镑）

Cordless hoover ideal for pets, £99.99 (was £132.49)无线式宠物吸尘器，现价：99.99英镑（原价：132.49英镑）

Louis Roederer champagne, £29.99 (was £38.36)法国路易王妃香槟，现价：29.99（原价：38.36）

Garmin Forerunner GPS Running Watch, £179.99 (was £220)佳明领跑者GPS运动手表，现价：179.99英镑（原价：220英镑）

Extra large Avantree Adjustable Laptop Bed Table, £31.99 (was £36.99)Avantree超大型床上电脑桌，现价：31.99英镑（原价：36.99英镑）

（翻译：进击的Meredith）
